mapper.update: update users set `number` = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, country_name = #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select `uid`, `number`, `password`, email, gender, occupation, country_id, country_name, created_at, updated_at from users where `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select `uid`, `number`, `password`, email, gender, occupation, country_id, country_name, created_at, updated_at from users
